name: intrepid-swe6733
description: Adventure-themed web app designed to connect outdoorsy people with similar interests and skill-levels and allow them to communicate and plan activities.

scripts.prepare-environment: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run --prefix frontend create-env && npm install --prefix backend && npm run --prefix backend create-env

author: Jeffrey Ganulin, Justin Hall, Edward Jeninsky III, Arbern Lim, Alexis McNeill, Milly Namukasa
